tool_description: Introducing ShortenedUrl, the ultimate URL shortening service designed to make sharing and managing links a breeze! Our user-friendly API offers a range of powerful features, including the ability to create, update, and delete custom shortened URLs with just a few clicks. With our secure API Key authorization, you can trust that your data is safe and your privacy protected. ShortenedUrl supports custom identifiers, making it easier than ever to create memorable, branded links that drive traff...
name: URL Shortner by FX
title: URL Shortner by FX

api_list.name: ShortendURLAdd
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortner-by-fx.p.rapidapi.com/generate/shortenedurl/add"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortner-by-fx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
